seo_title: Stuck in Shame & Guilt | Introductory – Recovery Mini-Course
short_description: A faith-based mini-course to help you face shame and guilt, receive God's forgiveness, and move forward without constant self-condemnation.

seo_title: Breaking the Cycle of Fear | Introductory – Recovery Mini-Course
short_description: A faith-based mini-course to expose how fear grips your mind and heart, and help you invite God's peace into every area of your life.

seo_title: Why Anxiety Won't Let Go | Introductory – Recovery Mini-Course
short_description: A faith-based mini-course to help you understand the hidden roots of anxiety and learn how to steady your heart in God's truth and presence.

seo_title: Trapped in Depression | Introductory – Recovery Mini-Course
short_description: A faith-based mini-course to help you understand the weight of depression, break isolation, and begin walking toward hope with God's help.

seo_title: Carrying the Weight of Grief | Introductory – Recovery Mini-Course
short_description: A faith-based mini-course to help you process grief and loss with God, honor what you've lost, and begin to breathe again.

seo_title: Losing Your Identity & Self-Worth | Introductory – Recovery Mini-Course
short_description: A faith-based mini-course to help you break free from false labels, reclaim your identity in Christ, and rebuild a healthy sense of worth.

seo_title: When Forgiveness Feels Impossible | Introductory – Recovery Mini-Course
short_description: A faith-based mini-course to help you release bitterness, understand biblical forgiveness, and step into deeper freedom and peace.
A faith-based mini-course to help you understand the emotional and spiritual roots of financial chaos and invite God into rebuilding stability.

seo_title: Struggling to Set Boundaries | Introductory – Recovery Mini-Course
short_description: A faith-based mini-course to help you set healthy, God-honoring boundaries without guilt, fear, or constant people-pleasing.

seo_title: Stuck in Your Past | Introductory – Recovery Mini-Course
short_description: A faith-based mini-course to help you heal the wounds of rejection and abandonment that keep pulling you back into old pain.

seo_title: Overwhelmed by Trauma | Introductory – Recovery Mini-Course
short_description: A faith-based mini-course to help you understand how trauma affects your body, mind, and spirit, and how God walks with you in the rubble.

seo_title: When Anger Turns Inward | Introductory – Recovery Mini-Course
short_description: A faith-based mini-course to help you understand anger, resentment, and self-directed rage, and learn how to bring it all to God safely.

course_title: Introductory – Recovery: Fear of Rejection & People-Pleasing
seo_title: Resentment Ruining Your Peace | Introductory – Recovery Mini-Course
short_description: A faith-based mini-course to help you see how fear of rejection and constant people-pleasing steal your peace and keep you resentful.

seo_title: Exhausted but Still Broken | Introductory – Recovery Mini-Course
short_description: A faith-based mini-course to help you recognize emotional burnout, reset your inner capacity, and receive God's rest and restoration.

seo_title: Feeling Lost in Your Purpose | Introductory – Recovery Mini-Course
short_description: A faith-based mini-course to help you reconnect with God's calling on your life after trauma, loss, or long seasons of survival.
A faith-based mini-course to help you confront despair, challenge hopeless thoughts, and cling to God's promises for your future.

seo_title: Why You Can't Move On | Introductory – Recovery Mini-Course
short_description: A faith-based mini-course to help you untangle from past emotional attachments and soul ties so you can move on with God in freedom.

seo_title: The Hidden Pattern Holding You Back | Introductory – Recovery Mini-Course
page_heading: The Hidden Pattern Holding You Back
short_description: A faith-based mini-course to help you uncover hidden subconscious patterns and drivers that silently keep you stuck in old cycles.
